panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method
panels.title: Network-level Requests

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method
panels.title: Network-level RPS

panels.description: When a request fails even after trying all upstreams and retries
panels.title: Network-level Errors

panels.description: When identical requests arrive at the same time they'll be merged, this number shows number of these requests
panels.title: Network-level Multiplexed requests

panels.description: When identical requests arrive at the same time they'll be merged, this number shows number of these requests
panels.title: Network-level Multiplexed requests

panels.description: Total hedged requests that ended up being actually faster and useful. The higher the better. If this value is too low try increasing the failsafe.hedge.quantile to higher value e.g. 0.99

targets.expr: 1 - ((sum(increase(erpc_network_hedge_discards_total{attempt!="1",network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (project, network, upstream)) / (sum(increase(erpc_network_hedged_request_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, upstream))) > 0

panels.title: Effective hedged requests

panels.description: Highest value for latest block polled from all upstreams across all replicas
panels.title: Highest Latest Block

panels.description: Highest value for latest block polled from all upstreams across all replicas
panels.title: Highest Finalized Block

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level Requests

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level RPS

panels.description: Total requests that are sent to upstream but is rate-limited by the provider node
panels.title: Upstream-level Remote rate-limited Requests

panels.description: Total requests rate-limited locally on eRPC before actually sending, based on defined budget
panels.title: Upstream-level self-imposed Ratel-limited requests

panels.description: Dynamically tuned value for maxCount of different rate limit budgets. NOTE This value is SUM of all replicas (in a multiple container setup)
panels.title: Rate-limit budget MaxCount

panels.description: The failures are more tolerable (e.g. rate limited, hedge-cancellations, etc) which doesn't mean upstream is failing, therefore less alert-worthy
panels.title: Upstream-level warning errors

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures
panels.title: Upstream-level critical errors

panels.description: A special lagging tracker showing only lags of above 5000 blocks which indicates node too far off.
panels.title: Out-of-sync latest block lag by Upstream

panels.description: How many times we had to Poll for latest block number. This number can go up by integrity module if debounce config is too low.
panels.title: Latest Block Polls

panels.description: Difference between lowest and highest finalized block as reported by upstreams. Min/Max/Mean are values across multiple replicas (if you have erpc in a multi-container setup)
panels.title: Finalized Block Lag by Upstream

panels.description: A special lagging tracker showing only lags of above 5000 blocks which indicates node too far off.
panels.title: Out-of-sync Finalized Blocks by Upstream

panels.description: How many times we had to Poll for finalized block number.
panels.title: Finalized Block Polls

panels.description: How many times upstream returned a stale latest block (compared to other nodes) for eth_getBlockByNumber(latest) and eth_blockNumber
panels.title: Stale latest block by Upstream

panels.description: How many times upstream returned stale finalized block (compared to other nodes) for eth_getBlockByNumber(finalized) and eth_blockNumber
panels.title: Stale finalized block by Upstream

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_success_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_success_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_success_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))
sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_error_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, error, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (cluster_name, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))
sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_error_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",error!="ErrRecordNotFound: record not found"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error))

panels.description: These are issues that are most often edge-cases that are not covered within eRPC logic, and must be reported to the team.
panels.title: Unexpected panics
